item.title: Artificial Ephemerality
item.description: Artificial Ephemerality Generative Art | 2018, Academic Work Objective How do we express “ephemerality” artificially? -- - Press "S" to save the current screenshot to your desktop. - Press "T" to turn on/off the music. - Press "P" to pause the generation process. Phase Concept, Design, Build Period 08/2018 (1 Week) Team Sole Project Role Maker, Coder What I did Define Experience Concept -- Method

item.title: IBM JAPAN DESIGNER'S BOARD
item.description: -- IBM JAPAN DESIGNER'S BOARD Graphic Design | 2016, Professional Work Objective How might IBM designers express our new design culture? Phase Concept, Develop, Deliver Period 12/2015 - 01/2016 Team Sole Project Role Graphic Designer What I did Define Experience Concept -- Method IBM Design Thinking Output Profile Board Product Golive 01/2016 - until now Concept Designed the profile board to show talents in the Tokyo Studio Result Apply to the atmosphere of our Tokyo studio Design Process Starting point was a respect to the traditional IBM philosophy Additionally, we reflect new IBM design culture 1st & 2nd prototype 3nd prototype Physical prototype and finalizing
